"...I'd like to tell you a story.
A story of a foolish \"thing\"
and a foolish \"person\"."

"When the \"thing\" that knew all things
met a \"person\" who held an interest in all things sets the stage for this story."
"The \"thing\" granted the wish of the \"person\", bestowing wisdom and knowledge."
"To the \"thing\", such knowledge was only trivial, but the \"person\" used it as a foundation for evolution."
"This \"person\" roused the curiosity of the \"thing\"."
"Despite being omniscient, it could not understand the \"person\"s heart. The \"thing\" was vexed."
"And thus, the \"thing\" and the \"person\" became partners."
"Providing what they wished from each other, they had a prosperous relationship which spanned a long, long time."
"The \"person\" was greedy and lazy. Yet for the sake of pleasure, it spared no effort. This involved wringing out knowledge from the \"thing\"."
"This kind of behaviour was unique and fun to observe, but... It was taken too lightly."
"When the \"thing\" noticed that it was the cause of this sloth and would bring about an eventual downfall, it stopped answering the \"person\"s summons."
"In doing so, with the intention to observe how the \"person\" would change..."
"The foolish one was not the \"person\". It is I, the one who know but did not answer, who was foolish."
"...Don't be concerned. When we met, I was happy. That is an unchangeable fact."
"If not, I would not be able to be standing here talking to you. I did not believe such a present was possible."
"There are many people who say \"The future is uncertain, therefore it is exciting.\" Now I, too, believe it is so."

"はい、わたし大正解！
やっぱりウォパルには人の手が
というか、ルーサーの手が入ってたね。"

"改造とかそういうの、あいつ本当に
好き勝手にやる奴だからね……
予想は出来てたよ、腹立つけど。"

"テオドールくんも、被害者だよね。
後天的に種族を書き換えるって……
無茶な改造にも程があるって感じかな。"

"好き勝手やられてるように思えたけど
貴方は、尽力していた。
テオドールくんを救うための鍵も得た。"

"ここまでの流れが、シオンの導きで
作られていたのだとしたら……
次がいよいよ、なのかな。"

"いくらお膳立てが出来ているとしても
一筋縄ではいかないことばかりだし……
きっと、辛いこともあるよね？"

"……うう、でもここまで来て
この先を見ない、ってわけには
いかないかな！"

"さ、次はいよいよシオンから託される
最後のマターボードが紡ぐ歴史だね。"

"
Matter Board [To Welcome The Future] has been obtained.
"
